Text: NOT WORKING! I convert this to an ISO using Wii Backup Manager, burn at 4x, and when I insert the disc in my NTSC-U Wii with Wiikey 2, it keeps making a weird noise then it eventually gives "An error has occurred...".

@vinnylima

Seeing as your warranty is already voided, you should softmod your wii so you can play any game through different USB loaders and cIOS versions. Wiikey is far less than spectacular.. so use letterbomb and install USB Loader GX :)

http://sites.google.com/site/completesg/home

(I only say this because you are missing out on something so simple to obtain)

@HobbitGamez

My Wii is also softmodded, but I prefer to run games through discs, exactly because the compatibility is way better: games are almost guaranteed to run. There is no way a game works through softmod and doesn't through disc.

@vinnylima

Not sure what to say to that. The game is working perfectly fine for me via USB Loader GX and cIOS 249 base 56. It seems with many other loaders it tends to freeze after every mission, so use USB Loader GX until another solution is found.
Confirmed working via USB Loader GX using d2x cIOS v6 249 [56 Base] as Hobbit says. Great up, thx man.
were cn i get the cios file thanks.

This is confirmed working for me with USB Loader GX too. For some strange reason, it doesn't work through disc on my Wii. Since current Wii systems don't work with modchips anymore, my previous feedback was irrelevant. I have to say sorry about that, HobbitGamez, and thank you very much for your upload.

I put this game on my Passport HD and after choosing the mode to play it would freeze up on the loading screen Now I can say this game works fine after patching my cIOS to d2x cIOS v6 249 [56 Base] Fallowing this Guide wiihacks.com/other-faq-guides-tutorials/88654-d2x-cios-installation-guide.html thx guys for the info being posted..... :D

Hi sorry to bother you. i downloaded this and attempted to load it in my wbfs loader and it would not show up. do you have any suggestions as what i may have to do to get this to work and load. thank you again for your time. have a great day.---------
